folder: Arthur Kill Road & Abingdon Avenue, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Abingdon Avenue
text:
(1)
600 Arthur Kill Road, south side, between Abingdon and Brookfield Aves., showing the Metcalfe homestead.
1924
P.L.Sperr
(2)
A full front view of the house.
June 17, 1924
By William T. Luvis through P.L.Sperr.

folder: Arthur Kill Road & Abingdon Avenue, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Abingdon Avenue
text:
651 Arthur Kill Road, west of the N.W. corner of Abingdon Avenue, showing the Benham-Seaman home. P. L. Sperr states that part of the house is about 200 years old. The view is northward.
May 1, 1926
P. L. Sperr
(s)
A view of the rear of the house.
April 28, 1925
P. L. Sperr
(3)
Viewing the house from the north.
My 30, 1927
P. L. Sperr

folder: Arthur Kill Road & Abingdon Avenue, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Abingdon Avenue
text:
651 Arthur Kill Road, west of the N.W. corner of Abingdon Avenue, showing the Benham--Seaman House, part of which is more than 200 years old. Views 2 and 3 are in an easterly direction.
May 1, 1925
Views 1, 2, 3
P. L. Sperr

folder: Arthur Kill Road & Abingdon Avenue, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Abingdon Avenue
text:
Arthur Kill Road, adjoining the N.W. corner of Abingdon Avenue, showing the ruins of the Benham Mansion. It was the residence of Admiral Andrew Ellicott Kennedy Benham which was destroyed by fire in 1897.
May 1, 1925
Views 1, 2
P.L. Soerr

folder: Arthur Kill Road & Abingdon Avenue, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Abingdon Avenue
text:
(1)
651 Arthur Kill Road, west of the N.W. corner of Abingdon Ave., showing the south end of Benham-Seaman House. P. L. Sperr states that part of the house is about two hundred years old.
April 7, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A view of the north end of the house.
April 7, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
